item.title: 5G Hasn’t Yet Hit Its Stride, But 6G Is Already on the Horizon
item.description: The companies that power telecom providers are already laying the groundwork for 6G communications.

item.title: Exclusive: REI’s CEO Shares the Retailing Co-Op’s Growth Strategy
item.description: Inside former Nike and Athleta executive Mary Beth Laughton’s plan to reverse losses at the legacy outdoor brand.

item.title: 3 Clues That Will Instantly Give Away Someone With Bad Leadership Traits
item.description: These signs defeat the purpose of calling someone a ‘leader.’

item.title: Walmart’s CEO Just Gave a Sobering Prediction About AI. The Time to Prepare Is Now
item.description: The world’s largest employer expects AI to touch every single job. The only question is how to prepare.

item.title: How China Plans to Cut 10 Percent of its Emissions by 2035
item.description: At the United Nations’ high-level climate summit, the world’s largest carbon-polluting nation, announced new plan to cut emissions.
